#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
#define  ll long long int
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	ll t;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		int k;
		scanf("%d",&k);
		char m[22][22];
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
				scanf("%s",&m[i]);
		int count=0;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
			{
				count=0;
				if(m[i][j]=='.')
				{
					count=1;
					for(int i1=i+1;i1<n;i1++)
					{
						if(m[i1][j]=='X')
							count++;
						else
							break;
					}
					if(count>=k)
					{
						cout<<"YES\n";
						goto level;
					}
					
					
					for(int i1=i-1;i1>=0;i1--)
					{
						if(m[i1][j]=='X')
							count++;
						else
							break;
					}
					if(count>=k)
					{
						cout<<"YES\n";
						goto level;
					}
					else
						count=1;
					for(int j1=j+1;j1<n;j1++)
					{
						if(m[i][j1]=='X')
							count++;
						else
							break;
					}
					if(count>=k)
					{
						cout<<"YES\n";
						goto level;
					}
					
					for(int j1=j-1;j>=0;j1--)
					{
						if(m[i][j1]=='X')
							count++;
						else
							break;
					}
					if(count>=k)
					{
						cout<<"YES\n";
						goto level;
					}
					else
						count=1;
					for(int i1=i+1,j1=j+1;i1<n&&j1<n;i1++,j1++)
					{
						if(m[i1][j1]=='X')
							count++;
						else
							break;
					}
					if(count>=k)
					{
						cout<<"YES\n";
						goto level;
					}
					
					for(int i1=i-1,j1=j-1;i1>=0&&j1>=0;i1--,j1--)
					{
						if(m[i1][j1]=='X')
							count++;
						else
							break;
					}
					if(count>=k)
					{
						cout<<"YES\n";
						goto level;
					}
					else
						count=1;
					for(int i1=i+1,j1=j-1;i1<n&&j1>=0;i1++,j1--)
					{
						if(m[i1][j1]=='X')
							count++;
						else
							break;
					}
					if(count>=k)
					{
						cout<<"YES\n";
						goto level;
					}
					
					for(int i1=i-1,j1=j+1;i1>=0&&j1<n;i1--,j1++)
					{
						if(m[i1][j1]=='X')
							count++;
						else
							break;
					}
					if(count>=k)
					{
						cout<<"YES\n";
						goto level;
					}
					
					
				}
				
			}
			
		}
		cout<<"NO\n";
		level : 
			continue;
	}
}
